website_summaries.verdict: In addition to a nice price, special features include thumb holes and waterproof, zippered pockets to keep you and your stuff warm and dry.
pros: Available in black or dark blue
Made of water-repellent shell with a fleece liner
Light, comfortable jacket retains heat well
Waterproof, zippered cross pockets and extras like an earphone line-fastening feature and thumb holes

customer_reviews.title: A+ great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great substitution for my $200 North face. Fits fine just a little larger than expected. 2 exterior pockets, one interior chest pocket. No string on the hood though to tighten around your face.. And NOT A DETACHABLE HOOD
customer_reviews.author: Mightymischevous

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice jacket, especially for the price! It feels well made and warm. It's not overly bulky for my son to wear to school with his bookbag. Looks nice and he loves the inside pocket for a phone or MP3 player along with the spot to run his headphones through. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Geissler

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is good.
customer_reviews.text: The description states that the hood is removable , it is not. Also states there are more pockets than on jacket. Not true. Otherwise it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Kula

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Works great in snow and cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Works great in snow and cold weather. I live in Ohio, if that helps. I like in the fleece lined interior.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Garey

customer_reviews.title: Warm Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great warm Jacket, fits well... The reason for 4 starts is I dont like that it does not have front pockets, and unfortunately this was not described in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good coat for the price. recommended to take 1 size down.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.G.

customer_reviews.title: Colors may appear different in the pictures than the actual product
customer_reviews.text: Received the jacket and as soon as I opened it I was disappointed. I ordered the grey jacket. When I looked at the pictures I could see grey on the outside and a greenish color inside around the waist area, which I was ok with. When i received the jacket it was greenish on the outside as well. Looks nothing like the picture. It does fit well and is quite comfortable so I've taken that into consideration for my rating.
customer_reviews.author: MMastro28

customer_reviews.title: Also looks great imo, so worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not as large and thick as I thought it would be. Still very warm with a long sleeve hoodie underneath. Also looks great imo, so worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ned Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Great coat if you need something slender and with length.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 year old son. He is on the tall side & VERY slender. It is hard to find him clothing that fits him lengthwise without being huge everywhere else. This was the first coat I found (out of many) that was even close to not looking like a tent. I bought him a medium. The chest measurements for the medium is 38-40”. The standard size for all the others coats’ mediums are 46-48”.
customer_reviews.author: C. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: JUST RIGHT !!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is SO picky. This coat replaced one he got years ago. He wears it every day. not too long, likes that it's not all one dark color (He can wear it to walk the dog at night).
customer_reviews.author: S. H. TENNEY

customer_reviews.text: i normally wear a lg, but took others advice and ordered x lg...it fits perfectly, and works great! an excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: kruze

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looked great out of the box. Seems looked strong and zipper was substantial. It was a gift so not sure how it wears.
customer_reviews.author: Macgyver

customer_reviews.title: A little small for a XXL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered XXL but I didn’t know that there are three sizes different, mine is a little tide
customer_reviews.author: Henry Cabaleiro

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, warm.
customer_reviews.text: Only negatives I found were: would have been nice to have sleeve pockets on upper arm, also a ring at bottom of zipper in order to attach gloves.
customer_reviews.author: William  W

customer_reviews.title: stay warm in cold, pocket zippers meh
customer_reviews.text: Great in snow and wind. Zippers are meh. Vacationing in CO and surprised by the Wantdo nation out here. Great value, keeps you warm in 25 degrees and snow, with 7 mph winds. My outer pocket zippers suck. Otherwise good bang for buck.
customer_reviews.author: jgeats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it on for fit. It is a perfect fit and will not be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Trell

customer_reviews.title: Price is Right
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is warm and Light just what I like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Look: A really weird cut: wide but short, square shoulders. Get it on your own risk, if you’re into unflattering looks. Quality: The worst quality i’ve ever seen honestly. One zipper doesn’t work, one fastener is broken. I’m surprised they dare to sell them for 70 bucks. it worth 15 max.
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very warm. My only complaint is that the pocket zippers are junk. Having pockets that won't zip in inclement weather kinda sucks and it's too late to return it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchased
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and warm. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: BigDog

customer_reviews.title: Great and great
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! It is very warm. And a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Yale

customer_reviews.title: good jacket, good is not removeable.
customer_reviews.text: super warm. hood does NOT DETACH. but still a great jacket. lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Perciful

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels really nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband's birthday he really likes it he says it's super warm and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket kept me so warm while I was skiing, that I was actually sweating in the snow. It kept me from getting wet as I skied past the blowers too. Overall, this is a great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM K LYONS

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore it few times during snowfall in Boston and he thinks it's very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Subodh A.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve length
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great except the length of the sleeves. About 2 inches too short.
customer_reviews.author: pems-integ-tests

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Needed it large to fit over medical device good quality
customer_reviews.author: kc&mee

customer_reviews.title: My BF loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought an extra large for my boyfriend. He wears large for shirts and sweaters. Going up a size was perfect. It fits as expected. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, one of my friend recommended this one. This jacket helped me alot in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Prudhvinath Allam

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Dealing with below freezing temps on cell towers and this baby did the trick. Keeps you warm and plenty of pockets to put extra warmers. Wind resistant and water resistant, very satisfying buy
customer_reviews.author: Chauncey Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great snow jacket
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price. Love this jacket! As a note- am usually somewhere between a small or medium, and medium is a bit large on me. Specifically waist and sleeve length. If on the edge I recommend opt for size down.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery Really keeps your body warmth Very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Bar

customer_reviews.title: Good coat for my teenager
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and it keeps him warm!! We got a large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on the pockets are hard to close and the main zipper tab broke off just zipping the jacket up!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for the price. My only complaint is that the hand liner of the sleeve would restrict me when I would reach out to adjust my bindings.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lockett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my fiancé, he loved it! Said it was very warm for not being a bulky coat.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Field

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets and thoughtful features for the price, great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely warm and comfortable coat. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm ski jacket
customer_reviews.text: I brought this jacket for my college student’s ski trip. He said it was great and kept him warm.
customer_reviews.author: maureen zembricki

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for price
customer_reviews.text: Very warm jacket. Didn't think it would be heavy like it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Thought it works have more pockets. Overall husband loved the jacket
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte DAVENPORT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jacket but horrible zipper
customer_reviews.text: Good quality jacket but zipper broke while snowboarding trying to unzip it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size sent
customer_reviews.text: I returned the jacket, I hope you all got it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Dian Shifflett

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my son and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son and he likes it , he says it fits well and is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving the coat!
customer_reviews.text: He loves the coat and he says “it’s very warm babe” lol. I’m glad, and it arrived way before the expected time which was good, so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tasia

customer_reviews.title: After a poor experience with another coat
customer_reviews.text: After a poor experience with another coat, I decided to give this one a try. I was more than pleasantly pleased. The fit is perfect. The attached thumb holes (like an under armour shirt) provide an extra level of protection against the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J.

product_meta.title: Wantdo Men's Waterproof Snowboard Jacket Windproof Mountain Winter Ski Snow Coat
feature_bullets: Warm Fabric: Professional water repellent coated, a fleece liner and soft comfortable hand feeling and durable fabric with 2400 polyester fibre
Waterproof: Water-repellent rain jacket can work under over 10000mm pressure head. Keep your body always dry and comfortable when you are outside, also can fights bad rainy or misty weather

Windproof: 1)Adjustable cuffs, stretchable glove with thumb hole help seal in warmth. 2)Inside windproof design, internal drawcord hem, and adjustable storm hood help to keep wind out. 3)Wear resisting soft and front-zip shell is highly wind resistant

Multi Pockets: 1)2 waterproof zippered plus cross pockets(passport, cards or gadgets stowed). 2)Dual internal pockets, 1 internal secure media pocket, 1 zippered pocket. 3)An earphone line fastening & supporting fixture available inside the jacket
Size notes: This snow coat offers a standard fit. Please choose by US size

Best use: The waterproof ski jacket can handle inclement weather easily, such as heavy fog, rainy or snow day. It's best for mountaineering, hiking, climbing, downhill skiing, snowboarding, snowsports, journey, and other winter outdoor sports or various occasions
